discourse_list.title: "Peep an EIP" Discussion about EIP-778 with Felix Lange

content.content: Discussion about EIP-778 w/ Felix Lange, facilitated by Pooja Ranjan. Also present: William Schwab and Brent Allsop Additional comments regarding EIP-778 are in the devp2p repo issues: https://github.com/ethereum/devp2p/issues/43
content.GPT-summary: The post is a discussion about EIP-778 with Felix Lange, facilitated by Pooja Ranjan. The post also mentions the presence of William Schwab and Brent Allsop. The post provides a link to additional comments regarding EIP-778 in the devp2p repo issues.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
